page.title: 09Combe Sydenham the future
page.content: Theed Estates have drawn up a 40 year plan for the development of the area. Having bought the estate in 1964 the first job was to launch a restoration plan. During the period l970-80 the{replanting of the derelict {woodlands}took top priority. But work on the house was also put in hand, the slate roof was repaired and the drainage overhauled. By using an old print from 1783 it was possible to make a good job of restoring the Gate house entrance tower. There is still work that is going to be done on the rest of the Gate house. The old Cornmill which has now been reroofed and repaired externally will become the centre for an {important education programme}once it has been improved inside.
